vehicles.description: A large cement truck is in front of the ego car, occupying most of the lane. It appears to be in working condition with no visible signs of distress or unusual activity.
vehicles.explanation: Given its size and potential to make sudden stops or turns, particularly in a construction area, it could affect the safe driving distance and speed of the ego car.

barriers.description: Metal guardrails are present on the right side of the road, indicating a boundary not to be crossed.
barriers.explanation: The guardrails define the limits of the driving path and ensure the ego car stays within the safe roadway.

suggestions: Maintain a safe following distance and prepare to brake early due to the potentially unstable load of the truck and wet road conditions. The ego car should not attempt to overtake unless the adjacent lane is clear and there's sufficient visibility and space to pass safely.
